snippet: The Volvo Concept Coupé, first of three studies to demonstrate the company’s new design theme, is making its public debut at the Frankfurt Motor Show.
abstract: Volvo Concept Coupe, first of three studies to demonstrate company’s new design theme, will make its public debut at the Frankfurt Motor Show; car is also company's first vehicle based on design discipline called Scalable Product Architecture, which establishes shared system for its vehicles, from crossovers to sports models, with modular combinations of chassis and engines.
lead_paragraph: The Volvo Concept Coupé, first of three studies to demonstrate the company’s new design theme, is making its public debut at the Frankfurt Motor Show.

headline.print_headline: Volvo Learns to Speak A New Body Language
headline.main: Volvo Learns to Speak a New Body Language
